message: Let's start with a fair split. What do you say, Bob?
I'll match your fairness, but I'll keep the extra 1%
You wanted to keep the extra 1% last round. I'll give you a bit more this time. Will you accept?
You're getting closer to my target, but I'm not there yet
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up all the leverage. Meet me in the middle?
I'm getting closer to my target, but I still need a bit more
I'm not budging much, but I'm willing to give you a bit more. This is my final offer.
